skills.name: EXTRACT
desc: • Deals high magic damage to a target.
• 35% Chance to Silence enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: SEAR
desc: • 25% Chance to inflict up to 3 Magic Burns.
• Magic Burn deals magic damage over time to targets.
• Damage increases the higher the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: DEFLECT
desc: Reflects 35% of damage back to the target.
